Html:
Hi,

I am using the datagird with FullRow SelectionUnit and my DataGridColumns are all readonly.

User can navigate between the rows with arrow keys, But what I dont want is the datagridcell to have a focus trail (dotted border around the cell), when using key board for row navigation,

Is there any way I can remove this focus trail on the grid cell?

Thanks,

Manju
Does anyone have a solution for my issue?
